Eternal Condition.quote: "That which never was not, will never not be. That which is, always was and always will be." (Bhagavad Gita 2:12)

Divine State.quote: "Be still, and know that I am God." (Psalm 46:10)

Sacred Presence.quote: "Wherever two or three gather in my name, there am I with them." (Matthew 18:20)

Spiritual Atmosphere.quote: "The wind blows wherever it pleases. You hear its sound, but you cannot tell where it comes from or where it is going." (John 3:8)

Divine Consciousness.quote: "The Self is everywhere. Bright is the Self, indivisible, untouched by sin, wise, immanent and transcendent." (Isha Upanishad 8)

Sacred Environment.quote: "Holy, holy, holy is the Lord Almighty; the whole earth is full of his glory." (Isaiah 6:3)

Divine Harmony.quote: "When all things return to the One, even the One returns to the Source." (Zen saying)

Spiritual Climate.quote: "As above, so below; as within, so without." (Hermes Trismegistus)

Sacred Space.quote: "This is none other than the house of God; this is the gate of heaven." (Genesis 28:17)

Divine Order.quote: "Everything has been created according to a measure." (Quran 54:49)

Eternal Now.quote: "There is only the eternal present, in which all times are contained." (Meister Eckhart)

Sacred Time.quote: "To everything there is a season, and a time to every purpose under heaven." (Ecclesiastes 3:1)

Divine Light.quote: "God is light; in him there is no darkness at all." (1 John 1:5)

Spiritual Atmosphere.quote: "Where there is dharma, there is victory." (Mahabharata)

Sacred Ground.quote: "Remove your sandals, for the place where you are standing is holy ground." (Exodus 3:5)

Divine Peace.quote: "Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you." (John 14:27)

Eternal Balance.quote: "The Tao produces one, one produces two, two produces three, three produces all things." (Tao Te Ching 42)

Sacred Union.quote: "That which is Below corresponds to that which is Above, and that which is Above corresponds to that which is Below." (Emerald Tablet)

Divine Silence.quote: "Silence is the language of God, all else is poor translation." (Rumi)

Spiritual State.quote: "The kingdom of God is within you." (Luke 17:21)

Sacred Moment.quote: "Every moment and every event of every man's life plants something in his soul." (Thomas Merton)

Divine Grace.quote: "By grace are ye saved through faith." (Ephesians 2:8)

Sacred Path.quote: "There are as many paths to God as there are souls on Earth." (Ramakrishna)

Divine Presence.quote: "I am with you always, even unto the end of the world." (Matthew 28:20)

Spiritual Reality.quote: "What is real is beyond all reach; what is at hand cannot be real." (Chuang Tzu)

Sacred Vision.quote: "Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God." (Matthew 5:8)

Divine Unity.quote: "All differences in this world are of degree, and not of kind, because oneness is the secret of everything." (Swami Vivekananda)

Sacred Knowledge.quote: "Knowledge of the self is the mother of all knowledge." (Khalil Gibran)
